Articles.Content:
I can get to space no probs, and either fall back to Kerbal, or fly off into the void....

what I need is some kind of guide to maintain a stable orbit...

any ideas?
okay don't woory, I found the calculator!! ;D

WELCOME TO KERBAL SPACE FORUM!

yea there is a calculator around. personally i enjoy just shooting off into some weird trajectory and pray that its in orbit
